title: Decorated Army Veteran Builds Second Career in the Bourbon Business
description: As the alcohol industry contends with the impact of tariffs, Lofted Spirits continues to excel thanks to two of the fastest-growing brands on the American whiskey market, Bardstown Bourbon and Green River. The company also has a unique brand of leadership in the C-Suite with CEO Mark Erwin at the helm. The retired US Army Colonel explains how his firm is navigating a challenged market and solidifying itself among the most reliable custom contract distilleries in the nation. Col. Erwin speaks with Carol Massar, Tim Stenovec and Bloomberg Wall Street Week host David Westin on Bloomberg Businessweek Daily. (Source: Bloomberg)
